data.intro: The work on 12 different schemes to promote agriculture sector was heading forward with rapid pace in south Punjab

data.heading: Fruit exports up by 21.29 percent in 4 months

data.heading: Over 6.85 million cotton bales reach ginneries across Pakistan, output surge by 70 pc
data.intro: Seed cotton (Phutti) equivalent to over 6.85 million or exactly 6,852,823 bales have reached ginning factories across the country till Nov 15, 2021, registering a whopping 70.16 per cent increase compared to corresponding period last year

data.heading: Over 6.8m cotton bales reach ginneries across Pakistan, with 70.16pc increase
data.intro: Eed cotton (Phutti) equivalent to over 6.8 million or exactly 68,52,823 bales have reached ginning factories across the country till November 15, 2021 registering increase of 70.16 percent as compared to corresponding period of last year

data.heading: Brazil Seeks Larger Fertilizer Supplies From Russia Amid Possible Sanctions Against Minsk
data.intro: Brazil wants to increase fertilizer supplies from Russia amid possible sanctions against Belarus, which accounts for almost 20% in the Brazilian fertilizer market, Brazilian Minister of Agriculture, Livestock, and Food Supply Tereza Cristina da Costa said on Wednesday

data.heading: Livestock dept offers balanced diet bags to farmers on subsidize prices
data.intro: Livestock Department is offering balanced food bags (Wanda) on subsidize prices to cattle farmers in order to improve production of milk, meat and animals strength

data.heading: S.Korea's rice production posts double-digit growth in 2021
data.intro: South Korea's rice production posted a double-digit growth this year, marking the first increase in six years amid favorable weather conditions, statistical office data showed Monday
